item.description:
The Boston Ayn Rand Meetup is going to see Atlas Shrugged on the big screen this Saturday, April 23, 2011!

We'll meet at Noon, inside the AMC Boston Common 19. Once inside, look for our group, with signs, just outside the auditorium in which Atlas is showing. (Download this PDF to see what the sign looks like.)

Buy tickets online (at fandango.com) and you can skip the box office and go right to the auditorium. Make sure you pick the correct date, Sat., 4/23, and click on the 12:35 showing.

The AMC Boston Common 19 is at 175 Tremont street Boston, MA.

According to Google, this is around the corner from the Boylston T Stations.

After the movie, we'll go for a bite to eat nearby and discuss the movie.

Looking forward to seeing the movie -- and my fellow admirers of Ayn Rand.

Regards,

Mark Shar

Organizer Pro Tem

FYI: The Atlas Movie Theater Listings Site:

http://www.atlasshruggedpart1.com/theaters
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Mark Shar (organizer) & folks with Ayn Rand Meetup Signs just outside the auditorium in which Atlas is playing

group.name: The Boston Ayn Rand Meetup Group

item.name: Atlas Shrugged Movie Event + A Bite to Eat & Discuss Afterward
